Remove stdlib and runtime dependencies on Foundation and CF

warn on empty OptionSet static constants

Add fast paths for String(decoding:…, as: Unicode.ASCII.self)
Optimize accessing Swift arrays via ObjC
BasicCalleeAnalysis: fix computation of class method callees if an overridden function has a different ABI

[ownership] Enable ownership lowering /after/ the diagnostic passes.
EscapeAnalysis cleanup and add utilities [nearly NFC]

stdlib: two small Array improvements

[SIL Optimization] Create new utilities for dead code elimination.

Rewrite AliasAnalysis may-release/may-decrement queries.

stdlib: code size improvements for Array

stdlib: annotate Array's remove functions with semantic attributes.
Use #file string for force-unwrap and force-try

stdlib: move Dictionary's find functions into __RawDictionaryStorage.
Turn off speculative devirtualization by default.

Improve optimization of lazy properties.
